subject: Belmont Stakes
I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Television
lead_paragraph: As a result of I’ll Have Another’s being scratched the day before the Belmont Stakes, NBC’s ratings and the racetrack’s attendance will probably take a big hit.
snippet: As a result of I’ll Have Another’s being scratched the day before the Belmont Stakes, NBC’s ratings and the racetrack’s attendance will probably take a big hit.
